Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with wait times of up to 15 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 15 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier track conditions near Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier track conditions near Howard. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
